SEARCH
Package util

Class CredentialManager

java.lang.Object
util.CredentialManager
public class CredentialManager extends Object
The CredentialManager class provides functionalities for managing user credentials. It includes methods for verifying passwords, tracking first login status, and updating passwords. The credentials are stored and maintained in a CSV file. This class follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure only one instance is active.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CredentialManager getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of CredentialManager. If the instance does not exist, it creates a new one.
      Returns:
      the single instance of this class.

    • verifyPassword

      public boolean verifyPassword(String userId, String password)
      Verifies if the provided password matches the stored hashed password for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user.
      password - the plain-text password to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches; false otherwise.

    • isFirstLogin

      public boolean isFirstLogin(String userId)
      Checks if a user is logging in for the first time.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user.
      Returns:
      true if it is the user's first login; false otherwise.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(String userId, String newPassword)
      Updates the password for a user and sets the first login flag to false.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user.
      newPassword - the new password to set.
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated; false otherwise.
